title: Promiscuous
description:
Murder. Lies. Betrayal. The players in the game are always the most unexpected.
A cold front was moving in. Knowing how Dylan felt about her, Brooke knew he would do anything to keep her safe.Committing murder wasn’t beneath him and it was dangerous for her to think that he could be involved in Amber’s death.Trapped in a dark place, alone with her thoughts, Brooke misses the man she can no longer remember, but existed long ago.The promise of rescue keeps her from losing what is left of her mind. Will she be found in time, or will she be just another statistic?Grab your copy of Promiscuous, the second book in The Fixer Series, today.
author: Alyson Raynes
